Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor sparked New York's lineup again
Luis Severino pitched seven crisp innings
B. Bello allowed 7 hits in 5 innings
P. Maton earned a save with 2 strikeouts in 1 inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets moved closer to a wild-card spot with the win
The Red Sox lost 3-0 in the series so far
The game was played at Citi Field with 35,064 in attendance
